title: Typebased (.com)
content:
A logo gallery with one of the better ideas behind it, which is to showcase just the wordmarks. Submit your works, people :-)

[http://www.typebased.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012174052/http:/www.typebased.com/ "http://www.typebased.com")
author: apankrat

comments.content:
I'm kind of tired of the '50 amazing new things' type blog galleries out there. They all seem to lack decent curators and you end up digging through a lot of crap.

There's a few nice things there but, as usual, it's mostly crap.
It's not just type blogs, it's anything design related. The internet thrives on that.

\> I'm kind of tired of the '50 amazing new things' type blog galleries out there.

I hear you. This one is pretty new and its selection criteria is interesting (at least to me). It wants to be very specialized, and that's a good thing. Whether it will live up to its full potential is an open question. That's why I said - "submit".

Nothing is as bad as the Flickr "chain-letter" stuff. Makes me sick.

hhp
